choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
Day 1: Grilled chicken with quinoa and steamed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
Day 2: Baked salmon with brown rice and roasted Brussels sprouts
Day 3: Turkey meatballs with zucchini noodles and sautéed mixed vegetables
Day 4: Grilled tofu with sweet potato wedges and stir-fried kale and bell peppers
Day 5: Lentil soup with whole wheat bread and a side salad of mixed greens and cherry tomatoes
Day 6: Vegetable curry with basmati rice and cucumber raita (yogurt-free)
Day 7: Stir-fried chicken breast with green beans and bok choy, served over brown rice
